DOC.brief_summary: This crossover , glucose-clamp study investigate impact different basal insulin infusion rate glucose control employ insulin pump different insulin delivery regimen . Patients randomize one 2 group , receive first study day insulin via pump pulsatile quasi-continuous delivery mode . On second study day switch treatment alternative delivery regimen . The anticipated duration trial 2 study day target sample size 14 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Monocenter , Open-Label Glucose Clamp Study Examining Metabolic Effect Insulin Infusion Intervals Basal Insulin Infusion Patients With Type I Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male patient 1865 year age Type I diabetes mellitus Currently continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion therapy Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require actue treatment within last 6 month Use systemic corticoid last 3 month Treatment medication know interfere glucose metabolism
